items.sentence: Tom has been working at the same factory for 25 years.
Tom has trouble keeping up with the rest of his class.
I wish Tom hadn\'t told Mary that I\'d been in prison.
I wish that Tom hadn\'t told Mary I\'d been in prison.
Tom said that Mary doesn\'t have to do that this week.
I think Tom knows what time he\'s supposed to be here.
Tom realized he shouldn\'t be doing what he was doing.
Tom really should\'ve given Mary more time to do that.
Tom and Mary didn\'t do anything we wanted them to do.
That store had just about everything we needed to buy.
